bibl.title: Un coup de théâtre annunciato. A proposito di Teocrito XV, 99. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Line 99 of Theokritus' Syrakosiai in P. Ant. [= M.-P.3 1487; LDAB 4004] variant, allows us to discover a case of "fake" theatre in "real" theatre. Interprets Theokritus' verses as an intentional reperformance of a scene from Old Comedy transformed in the "main scene" of a Hellenistic mime.
